rundown: 10-1 W @ Cleveland Guardians Joey Wentz: 6.0 innings, 1 earned run, 3 hits, 1 HR, 5 strikeouts Batters: Michael Harris II (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 3 RBI) Nick Allen (3 hits - 4 AB, 2 RBI) Nacho Alvarez Jr. (3 hits - 4 AB, 1 RBI) The Braves secured a dominant victory over the Cleveland Guardians, showcasing their offensive power and solid pitching. Key highlights include Michael Harris II's impactful performance with a home run and three RBIs, Nick Allen's three hits contributing to the run total, and Joey Wentz's effective outing on the mound, allowing only one earned run. The Braves' offense was relentless, accumulating 14 hits and scoring in multiple innings to seal the win.
